name: Molnar Roses
description: Recreation of one of Vera Molnárs artworks. The code was inspired by Garrits molnar.js but modified to look like roses instad of squares. The main idea was to recreate it using different forms. By playing around with the code I managed to change the bakground and the stroke to different kinds of red and with the help of ChatGPT i created the look of roses.

name: Molnar
description: Recreation of one of Vera Molnárs artworks. The code was inspired by Garrits molnar.js but modified. The main idea was to make it pop with some motion and color. By playing around with the code I managed to randomize the color of each stroke and make the artwork flicker.

name: Name of your experiment
